bibl.title: The Hellenistic Settlements in Syria, the Red Sea Basin, and North Africa.
bibl.note: Fait suite à: IDEM, The Hellenistic Settlements in Europe, the Islands, and Asia Minor = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 17 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - Oxford, 1995). - Pp. 345-352: VII. Egypt (Euergetis; - Kleopatra; - Paraitonion; - Philometoris; - Ptolemais in the Thebaid); - 353-381: VIII. Alexandreia near Egypt; - 383-396: IX. Cyrenaica; - 409-423: Appendix IV. "Alexandria ad Aegyptum".
bibl.seg: COHEN Getzel M., The Hellenistic Settlements in Syria, the Red Sea Basin, and North Africa. (Hellenistic Culture and Society. 46.)
Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, University of California Press, 2006, 8°, xiv-491 pp., 9 cartes. ISBN 0-520-24148-0. $85.

Fait suite à: IDEM, The Hellenistic Settlements in Europe, the Islands, and Asia Minor = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 17 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - Oxford, 1995). - Pp. 345-352: VII.
